Package com.ibm.di.config.base

Provides classes that implement the Tivoli Directory Integrator configuration model.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ALMappingConfigImpl This is the implementation class for the configuration of an AssemblyLine Attribute Map Component.
AssemblyLineConfigImpl The implementation class for the configuration of an AssemblyLine.
AttributeMapConfigImpl The implementation class for the configuration of an AttributeMap
AttributeMapItemImpl The implementation class of the AttributeMapItem interface.
BaseConfigurationImpl This class provides the basic methods for all the configuration classes.
BranchConditionImpl Implementation of the configuration for a single condition in a BranchingConfig.
BranchingConfigImpl Implements the configuration of a component used to branch the business logic
CallConfigImpl Deprecated.  
CallParamConfigImpl Deprecated.  
CheckpointConfigImpl Deprecated.  
ConfigCache Class used by the MetamergeConfigImpl and MetamergeConfigXML classes as an internal cache of configurations.
ConfigStatistics Class providing statistics for config such as :
number of bind calls
number of rebind calls
number of unbind calls
number of lookup calls
number of modify calls
ConnectorConfigImpl This class implements the TDI Connector configuration.
ConnectorSchemaConfigImpl Deprecated.  
ConnectorSchemaItemConfigImpl Deprecated.  
ContainerConfigImpl Implements a Container containing BaseConfiguration objects.
DeltaConfigImpl Implements a Delta Configuration, which is used by Connectors in Iterator mode.
ExposedPropertyImpl Implementation of ExposedProperty interface.
ExternalPropertiesImpl Deprecated.  
FileNamespace This implementation provides access via the file system.
FormConfigImpl Implementation of the configuration of a Form that can be displayed by the Configuration Editor
FormConfigUtil  
FormItemConfigImpl Implementation of one item in a FormConfigImpl
FormSectionImpl Implementation of one section in a FormConfigImpl
FunctionConfigImpl The configuration for a TDI Function Component, e.g.
HookConfigImpl This is the implementation class for the configuration of a single Hook.
HooksConfigImpl Implements the configuration for all the Hooks e.g.
InheritConfigImpl Deprecated.  
InstanceConfigImpl Implements Configuration Instance parameters, e.g the name of the Config Instance and which AssemblyLines should be automatically started.
InternalSchema This class defines all the parameter names used in other Configuration classes as String constants, to make it easier to use the same name everywhere.
LibraryConfigImpl Implements LibraryConfig
LinkCriteriaConfigImpl Implements the configuration for a Link Criteria in a Connector.
LinkCriteriaItemImpl Implements the configuration for a single item in a LinkCriteriaConfig.
LogConfigImpl Implements the Logging Configuration for e.g.
LogConfigItemImpl The configuration of a single Logger for e.g.
LoopConfigImpl Implements the configuration for a Loop Component in an AssemblyLine.
MetamergeConfigImpl Implements MetamergeConfig.
MetamergeFolderImpl Implements a container for other folders and leaf configuration objects.
NamespaceConfigImpl Implements a configuration object describing another configuration that is included in this MetamergeConfig.
OperationConfigImpl Implements the Configuration for a single AssemblyLine operation.
ParserConfigImpl Implements the configuration for a Parser
PoolDefConfigImpl Implements the configuration for a Connector Pool definition.
PoolInstanceConfigImpl Implements the configuration used by a Connector using a Connector Pool.
PropertyConfigImpl Implements PropertyConfig
PropertyManagerImpl Manages the Property Stores in a MetamergeConfig.
PropertyStoreConfigImpl Implements the configuration for a single Property Store.
RawConnectorConfigImpl Contains all the parameters needed to load and instantiate a Connector.
RawFunctionConfigImpl Contains all the parameters needed to load and instantiate a Function.
ReconnectConfigImpl Implements (@link ReconnectConfig}
ReconnectRuleConfigImpl This class implements reconnect rule configuration methods.
RemoteConfigURL Deprecated.  
SandboxConfigImpl Implements SanboxConfig
SchedulerConfigImpl Implements a SchedulerConfig.
SchemaConfigImpl Implements SchemaConfig
SchemaItemConfigImpl Describes the configuration of an item from a schema
SchemaName A CompoundName that can be used to access hierarchical SchemaItems.
ScriptConfigImpl Implements the configuration for a Script Component in an AssemblyLine
SequenceConfigImpl  
SimulationConfigImpl This class is used to configure the AssemblyLine's simulation mode.
SolutionInterfaceImpl This class provides access to the Solution interface settings of a configuration.
TombstonesConfigImpl Implements TombstonesConfig
TreeMapEnumeration This class implements an Enumeration on a configuration object that belongs to a MetamergeConfig.
ValidatorConfigImpl An implementation of ValidatorConfig that can be used in the form of the Component.
 

Package com.ibm.di.config.base Description

Provides classes that implement the Tivoli Directory Integrator configuration model.
